lines: COME, WE THAT LOVE THE LORD
Kamuza muswilile mazwi a leza wesu
Tuimbe lwimbo lubotu, Tuimbe lwimbo lubotu
Ku cuuno ca leza ku cuuno ca Leza.
Twaitwa swe tonse A tufwambane bakwesu
Tu la lweendo ku Zioni Ku Munzi wa kwe Leza.
Baya ku pengesya lyoonse, baya ku pegesya lyoonse
Tatuna sika kujulu, Tatuna sika kujulu
Tatuna kweenda mu nzila ya golide.
Tuya kuli Leza wesu, Tuya kuli Leza wesu
